results.name: a(n) = A048675(sigma(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = A048675(sigma(p^e)) = A048675(1 + p + p^2 + ... + p^e).
mathematica: {0}~Join~Array[Total@ Map[#[[-1]]*2^(PrimePi[#[[1]]] - 1) &, FactorInteger@ DivisorSigma[1, #]] &, 86, 2] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 08 2020, after _Jean-François Alcover_ at A048675 *)
